<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access/> <active>true</active> <api_name>global.ScrumComponentsTableSetter</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <description>Provides filtering capabilities for the Scrum Components module.</description> <name>ScrumComponentsTableSetter</name> <script><![CDATA[var ScrumComponentsTableSetter = Class.create();
ScrumComponentsTableSetter.prototype = Object.extendsObject(DefaultTableSetter, { process: function() { var propertyName = "com.snc.sdlc.scrum.pp.theme_tables"; return this.getTableNames(propertyName); } });]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2011-06-20 21:01:17</sys_created_on> <sys_id>49feb37eef130000a7450fa3f82256ff</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>ScrumComponentsTableSetter</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Agile Development" source="com.snc.sdlc.scrum.pp">4e159f242fc10110d8a4d5f62799b627</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_49feb37eef130000a7450fa3f82256ff</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2011-10-04 10:26:38</sys_updated_on> <u_script_length>276</u_script_length> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
